result.eng: He wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ga: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.html: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadhHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sé sásta laḃairt liom a ṫuilleaḋHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.

result.eng: She wasn't willing to help me.
result.ga: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liom
result.orig: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liom
result.html: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liomShe wasn't willing to help me.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sí toilteanaċ cuidiú liomShe wasn't willing to help me.

result.eng: I am not willing to pay for it.
result.html: Níl mé sásta íoc asI am not willing to pay for it.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé sásta íoc asI am not willing to pay for it.

result.eng: I'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh Dé
result.orig: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh Dé
result.html: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh DéI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé oíċe Aoine ṫú le cúnaṁ DéI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
